contents.text: Welcome to Runway Incubator, San Francisco’s premier coworking and innovation hub uniting entrepreneurs, startups, VCs, mentors, Fortune 500 companies, and industry experts.
For membership services and facility tours, press 1.
To speak with a membership specialist about plans and pricing, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a membership specialist.

navigationGoals: Get details on available membership plans and pricing
I want to talk about membership plans and any veteran discounts available.
Discuss and compare the Standard vs. Premium membership tiers, focusing on dedicated desk access and API integration for room booking.
I need someone to explain your membership plans and any senior discounts.
I’d like to find out about student membership plans and pricing at Runway Incubator.

contents.text: To schedule a tour of our San Francisco workspace, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our tours team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a tour of the San Francisco coworking space
I’d like to schedule a tour of the San Francisco workspace to see the facilities.
Schedule a guided tour of the San Francisco workspace, with emphasis on inspecting the 10 Gbps fiber network and IoT-enabled meeting rooms.
I'd like to book a tour of the San Francisco space and may need extra help when I arrive.
I want to arrange a tour of the San Francisco coworking space to assess its study and collaboration facilities.

contents.text: For community events and mentorship programs, press 2.
For information on upcoming events and workshops, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our events coordinator.

navigationGoals: Learn about upcoming community events and workshops
I need information on upcoming events and workshops that support veteran entrepreneurs.
Get details on upcoming AI and blockchain-focused workshops, including dates, formats, and registration deadlines.
I'd like details on upcoming community workshops and how I can register.
I need details on upcoming community events and workshops relevant to physics students.

contents.text: To connect with mentors and industry experts, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our mentorship program team.

navigationGoals: Connect with a mentor through the incubator’s mentorship program
I want to connect with a mentor who has experience guiding veteran-led startups.
Connect with a cybersecurity industry expert for one-on-one mentorship sessions and career guidance.
I need to speak with a mentor about my startup idea and get some guidance.
I’d like to speak with a mentor experienced in physics startups for guidance.
